page.title: 15SHOPPING IN NE LEICS
page.content: Due to the lack of regular public transport and the isolated position of many houses all adults drive a motor car and most families own at least one vehicle. Banking, shopping and livestock markets are found at Melton Mowbray, Leicester and Oakham. Food shopping is done at large supermarkets in Melton or Leicester on a weekly or monthly basis and small general stores and post offices at Twyford, Tilton and Burrough on the Hill are used. Milk is delivered and mobile shops call at intervals. The B6047 road from Melton Mowbray to Market Harborough carries the bulk of traffic passing through the area with many heavy goods vehicles supplying goods to the farms and transporting livestock and produce. A weekly bus service to Leicester serves the area.
